data.name: Simple, practical ideas for entrepreneurs to navigate thtough tough times
data.summary:
Understanding the small but powerful nuances of work.
Listening to the perspectives of an author, businessman, traveller & an IIMA Gold Medalist.
Join the threads of Anekantvaad, Disruptive Thinking & Your Own Obituary to add that missing pinch of salt in your recipe of life.
data.speakers: Mr Sanjay Kumar Jain, Managing Director, TT Limited and Author of Pinch of Salt in Recipe Called Life
